092/**
093 * The core class of TNE which should be used within each implementation's class.
094 *
095 * @author creatorfromhell
096 * @since 0.1.1.17
097 */
098public abstract class TNECore extends PluginEngine {
099
100  /*
101   * Core final variables utilized within TNE.
102   */
103  public static final String coreURL = "https://tnemc.net/files/module-version.xml";
104  public static final String version = "0.1.4.0";
105  public static final String build = "SNAPSHOT-9";
106  protected static TNECore instance;
107
108  /* Key Managers and Object instances utilized with TNE */
109  protected final YamlStorageManager yamlManager = new YamlStorageManager();
110  private final TNEAPI api = new TNEAPI();
111  //General Key Object Instances
112  protected EconomyManager economyManager;
113  protected Updater updater;
114  protected UUID serverAccount;
115  private MainConfig config;
116  private DataConfig data;
117  private MessageConfig messageConfig;
118  private Chore<?> autoSaver = null;
119
120  public TNECore() {
121
122    instance = this;
123  }
124
125  /**
126   * The implementation's {@link EconomyManager}, which is used to manage everything economy related
127   * in TNE.
128   *
129   * @return The {@link EconomyManager Economy Manager}.
130   */
131  public static EconomyManager eco() {
132
133    return instance.economyManager;
134  }
135
136  public static YamlStorageManager yaml() {
137
138    return instance.yamlManager;
139  }
140
141  public static TNECore instance() {
142
143    return instance;
144  }
145
146  public static TNEAPI api() {
147
148    return instance.api;
149  }
150
151  @Override
152  public String versionCheckSite() {
153
154    return "https://tnemc.net/files/tnebuild.txt";
155  }
156
157  @Override
158  public String version() {
159
160    return version;
161  }
162
163  @Override
164  public String build() {
165
166    return build;
167  }
168
169  @Override
170  public void registerConfigs() {
171
172    this.config = new MainConfig();
173    this.data = new DataConfig();
174    this.messageConfig = new MessageConfig();
175
176    PluginCore.log().inform("Loading configurations!");
177    if(!this.config.load()) {
178      PluginCore.log().error("Failed to load main configuration!", DebugLevel.OFF);
179    }
180
181    if(!this.data.load()) {
182      PluginCore.log().error("Failed to load data configuration!", DebugLevel.OFF);
183    }
184
185    if(!this.messageConfig.load()) {
186      PluginCore.log().error("Failed to load message configuration!", DebugLevel.OFF);
187    } else {
188      this.messageConfig.loadLanguages();
189    }
190  }
191
192  @Override
193  public void registerPluginChannels() {
194
195    PluginCore.instance().getChannelMessageManager().register(new BalanceHandler());
196    PluginCore.instance().getChannelMessageManager().register(new SyncHandler());
197    PluginCore.instance().getChannelMessageManager().register(new net.tnemc.core.channel.MessageHandler());
198  }
199
200  @Override
201  public void registerStorage() {
202
203    final StorageSettings settings = new StorageSettings(
204            DataConfig.yaml().getString("Data.Database.File"),
205            DataConfig.yaml().getString("Data.Database.SQL.Host"),
206            DataConfig.yaml().getInt("Data.Database.SQL.Port"),
207            DataConfig.yaml().getString("Data.Database.SQL.DB"),
208            DataConfig.yaml().getString("Data.Database.SQL.User"),
209            DataConfig.yaml().getString("Data.Database.SQL.Password"),
210            DataConfig.yaml().getString("Data.Database.Prefix"),
211            DataConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Data.Database.SQL.PublicKey"),
212            DataConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Data.Database.SQL.SSL"),
213            "TNE",
214            DataConfig.yaml().getInt("Data.Pool.MaxSize"),
215            DataConfig.yaml().getLong("Data.Pool.MaxLife"),
216            DataConfig.yaml().getLong("Data.Pool.Timeout"),
217            DataConfig.yaml().getString("Data.Sync.Type")
218    );
219
220    final JedisPoolConfig config = new JedisPoolConfig();
221    config.setMaxTotal(DataConfig.yaml().getInt("Data.Sync.Redis.Pool.MaxSize", 10));
222    config.setMaxIdle(DataConfig.yaml().getInt("Data.Sync.Redis.Pool.MaxIdle", 10));
223    config.setMinIdle(DataConfig.yaml().getInt("Data.Sync.Redis.Pool.MinIdle", 1));
224
225    String redisUser = (DataConfig.yaml().contains("Data.Sync.Redis.User"))? DataConfig.yaml().getString("Data.Sync.Redis.User") : null;
226    if(redisUser != null && redisUser.equalsIgnoreCase("none")) {
227      redisUser = null;
228    }
229
230    String redisPass = (DataConfig.yaml().contains("Data.Sync.Redis.Password"))? DataConfig.yaml().getString("Data.Sync.Redis.Password") : null;
231    if(redisPass != null && redisPass.equalsIgnoreCase("none")) {
232      redisPass = null;
233    }
234
235    this.storage = new StorageManager(DataConfig.yaml().getString("Data.Database.Type"),
236                                      new TNEStorageProvider(), settings, new JedisPool(config, DataConfig.yaml().getString("Data.Sync.Redis.Host"),
237                                                                                        DataConfig.yaml().getInt("Data.Sync.Redis.Port"),
238                                                                                        DataConfig.yaml().getInt("Data.Sync.Redis.Timeout"),
239                                                                                        redisUser,
240                                                                                        redisPass,
241                                                                                        DataConfig.yaml().getInt("Data.Sync.Redis.Index"),
242                                                                                        DataConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Data.Sync.Redis.SSL")));
243  }
244
245  @Override
246  public @NotNull <A extends CommandActor> LampBuilderVisitor<A> registerParameters() {
247
248    return builder->builder.parameterTypes()
249            .addParameterType(Account.class, new AccountResolver())
250            .addParameterType(AccountStatus.class, new StatusResolver())
251            .addParameterType(DebugLevel.class, new DebugResolver())
252            .addParameterType(Currency.class, new CurrencyResolver())
253            .addParameterType(BigDecimal.class, new BigDecimalResolver())
254            .addParameterType(ParseMoney.class, new MoneyResolver())
255            .addParameterType(PercentBigDecimal.class, new PercentDecimalResolver());
256  }
257
258  @Override
259  public void registerCommands() {
260
261    //Custom Parameters:
262    //TODO: Register custom validators
263  }
264
265  @Override
266  public void registerCallbacks(final CallbackManager callbackManager) {
267
268    callbackManager.addCallback(TNECallbacks.ACCOUNT_TYPES.id(), new CallbackEntry(AccountTypesCallback.class));
269    callbackManager.addCallback(TNECallbacks.ACCOUNT_LOAD.id(), new CallbackEntry(AccountLoadCallback.class));
270    callbackManager.addCallback(TNECallbacks.ACCOUNT_SAVE.id(), new CallbackEntry(AccountSaveCallback.class));
271    callbackManager.addCallback(TNECallbacks.ACCOUNT_CREATE.id(), new CallbackEntry(AccountCreateCallback.class));
272    callbackManager.addCallback(TNECallbacks.ACCOUNT_DELETE.id(), new CallbackEntry(AccountDeleteCallback.class));
273    callbackManager.addCallback(TNECallbacks.TRANSACTION_PRE.id(), new CallbackEntry(PreTransactionCallback.class));
274    callbackManager.addCallback(TNECallbacks.TRANSACTION_POST.id(), new CallbackEntry(PostTransactionCallback.class));
275    callbackManager.addCallback(TNECallbacks.CURRENCY_DROP.id(), new CallbackEntry(CurrencyDropCallback.class));
276    callbackManager.addCallback(TNECallbacks.CURRENCY_LOAD.id(), new CallbackEntry(CurrencyLoadCallback.class));
277    callbackManager.addCallback(TNECallbacks.DENOMINATION_LOAD.id(), new CallbackEntry(DenominationLoadCallback.class));
278  }
279
280  @Override
281  public String commandHelpWriter(final ExecutableCommand command, final CommandActor actor) {
282
283    final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Commands.Help.Entry");
284    data.addReplacement("$command", command.path());
285    data.addReplacement("$arguments", MessageHandler.getInstance().getTranslator().translateNode(new MessageData("Messages.Commands." + command.usage()), "default"));
286    data.addReplacement("$description", MessageHandler.getInstance().getTranslator().translateNode(new MessageData("Messages.Commands." + command.description()), "default"));
287
288    return MessageHandler.getInstance().getTranslator().translateNode(data, "default");
289  }
290
291  @Override
292  public void registerUpdateChecker() {
293
294    if(MainConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Core.Update.Check")) {
295      this.updateChecker = new Updater();
296
297      PluginCore.log().inform("Running version: " + version() + " Build: " + build());
298
299      PluginCore.log().inform("Build Stability: " + this.updateChecker.stable());
300
301      if(this.updateChecker.needsUpdate()) {
302        PluginCore.log().inform("Update Available! Latest: " + this.updateChecker.getBuild());
303      }
304
305      if(this.updateChecker.isEarlyBuild()) {
306        PluginCore.log().inform("Running pre-release version! Thanks for being a tester!");
307      }
308    }
309  }
310
311  @Override
312  public void postConfigs() {
313
314    //set our debug options.
315    PluginCore.instance().setLevel(DebugLevel.fromID(MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.Debugging.Mode")));
316
317    this.economyManager = new EconomyManager();
318
319    this.economyManager.init();
320
321    if(!this.economyManager.currency().load(PluginCore.directory(), false)) {
322      return;
323    }
324
325    this.economyManager.currency().saveCurrenciesUUID(PluginCore.directory());
326
327    final UUID serverID;
328    //Set our server UUID. This is used for proxy messaging.
329    final boolean randomUUID = MainConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Core.Server.RandomUUID", false);
330
331    if(!randomUUID) {
332      if(!MainConfig.yaml().contains("Core.ServerID")) {
333
334        serverID = UUID.randomUUID();
335        MainConfig.yaml().set("Core.ServerID", serverID.toString());
336        MISCUtils.setComment(MainConfig.yaml(), "Core.ServerID", "Don't modify unless you know what you're doing.");
337
338        try {
339          MainConfig.yaml().save();
340        } catch(final IOException e) {
341          PluginCore.log().error("Issue while saving Server UUID to config.yml", e, DebugLevel.OFF);
342        }
343      } else {
344        serverID = UUID.fromString(MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.ServerID"));
345      }
346    } else {
347      serverID = UUID.randomUUID();
348    }
349    PluginCore.instance().setServerID(serverID);
350  }
351
352  @Override
353  public void postStorage() {
354
355  }
356
357  @Override
358  public void postEnable() {
359
360    MenuManager.instance().addMenu(new MyEcoMenu());
361    MenuManager.instance().addMenu(new MyBalMenu());
362    MenuManager.instance().addMenu(new TransactionMenu());
363
364    this.storage.loadAll(Account.class, "");
365
366    this.storage.loadAll(Receipt.class, "");
367
368    this.economyManager.setReloadTime(new Date().getTime());
369
370    final String name = MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.Server.Account.Name");
371    serverAccount = UUID.nameUUIDFromBytes(("NonPlayer:" + name).getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
372
373    if(MainConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Core.Server.Account.Enabled")) {
374
375      PluginCore.log().inform("Checking Server Account.");
376
377      if(economyManager.account().findAccount(serverAccount.toString()).isEmpty()) {
378
379        PluginCore.log().inform("Creating Server Account.");
380
381        final AccountAPIResponse response = economyManager.account().createAccount(serverAccount.toString(), name, true);
382        if(response.getResponse().success()) {
383
384          PluginCore.log().inform("Server Account has been created.");
385
386          final BigDecimal defaultBalance = new BigDecimal(MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.Server.Account.Balance"));
387          if(defaultBalance.compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) > 0) {
388            response.getAccount().ifPresent(value->value.setHoldings(new HoldingsEntry(economyManager.region().defaultRegion(),
389                                                                                       economyManager.currency().defaultCurrency().getUid(),
390                                                                                       defaultBalance,
391                                                                                       EconomyManager.NORMAL
392            )));
393          }
394        } else {
395          PluginCore.log().error("Unable to create Server Account. Reason: " + response.getResponse().response());
396        }
397      }
398    }
399
400    //Set up the auto saver if enabled.
401    if(DataConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Data.AutoSaver.Enabled")) {
402
403      this.autoSaver = PluginCore.server().scheduler().createRepeatingTask(()->{
404                                                                             storage.storeAll();
405                                                                           }, new ChoreTime(0),
406                                                                           new ChoreTime(DataConfig.yaml().getInt("Data.AutoSaver.Interval"), TimeUnit.SECONDS),
407                                                                           ChoreExecution.SECONDARY);
408    }
409
410
411    economyManager.printInvalid();
412
413    PluginCore.server().scheduler().createDelayedTask(()->economyManager.getTopManager().load(), new ChoreTime(2), ChoreExecution.SECONDARY);
414    PluginCore.server().scheduler().createRepeatingTask(()->economyManager.getTopManager().load(), new ChoreTime(2), new ChoreTime(MainConfig.yaml().getInt("Core.Commands.Top.Refresh"), TimeUnit.SECONDS), ChoreExecution.SECONDARY);
415  }
416
417  @Override
418  public void postDisable() {
419
420    if(autoSaver != null) {
421      autoSaver.cancel();
422    }
423
424    final Optional<Datable<?>> data = Optional.ofNullable(storage.getEngine().datables().get(Account.class));
425    if(data.isPresent()) {
426      data.get().storeAll(storage.getConnector(), null);
427    }
428  }
429
430  public MainConfig config() {
431
432    return config;
433  }
434
435  public DataConfig data() {
436
437    return data;
438  }
439
440  public MessageConfig message() {
441
442    return messageConfig;
443  }
444
445  public UUID getServerAccount() {
446
447    return serverAccount;
448  }
449
450  public abstract <INV> ItemCalculations<INV> itemCalculations();
451
452  public AbstractItemStack<?> denominationToStack(final ItemDenomination denomination) {
453
454    return denominationToStack(denomination, 1);
455  }
456
457  public AbstractItemStack<?> denominationToStack(final ItemDenomination denomination, final int amount) {
458
459    AbstractItemStack<?> stack = PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of(denomination.material(), amount).debug(false);
460
461    if(!denomination.enchantments().isEmpty()) {
462      stack = stack.enchant(denomination.enchantments());
463    }
464
465    if(!denomination.flags().isEmpty()) {
466      stack = stack.flags(denomination.flags());
467    }
468
469    if(!denomination.getLore().isEmpty()) {
470      stack = stack.lore(denomination.getLore());
471    }
472
473    if(denomination.getDamage() > 0) {
474      stack = stack.damage(denomination.getDamage());
475    }
476
477    if(!denomination.getName().isEmpty()) {
478      stack = stack.customName(MiniMessage.miniMessage().deserialize(denomination.getName()));
479    }
480
481    if(denomination.getCustomModel() > -1) {
482      stack = stack.modelDataOld(denomination.getCustomModel());
483    }
484
485    if(!denomination.provider().equalsIgnoreCase("vanilla")) {
486      stack = stack.setItemProvider(denomination.provider()).setProviderItemID(denomination.providerID());
487    }
488
489    if(!denomination.itemModel().isEmpty()) {
490      stack = stack.itemModel(denomination.itemModel());
491    }
492
493    if(!denomination.modelBooleans().isEmpty() || !denomination.modelStrings().isEmpty()
494       || !denomination.modelColours().isEmpty() || !denomination.modelFloats().isEmpty()) {
495
496      stack = stack.modelData(denomination.modelColours(), denomination.modelFloats(),
497                              denomination.modelBooleans(), denomination.modelStrings());
498    }
499
500    if(denomination.maxStack() > 0) {
501      stack = stack.maxStackSize(denomination.maxStack());
502    }
503    return stack;
504  }
505}
